keyMoments.title: Luffy's Life in Danger
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates face a crisis when their captain Luffy requires an emergency blood transfusion after losing significant blood in his battle with Hordy Jones.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a situation where the crew must rely on outside help, specifically Jinbe, to save their captain's life.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Invites Jinbe to Join
keyMoments.description: After recovering, Luffy extends an invitation to Jinbe to join the Straw Hat Pirates as a full member, recognizing his worth and friendship.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Jinbe's journey toward becoming the crew's helmsman, though his official joining doesn't occur until much later.

keyMoments.title: Citizens Acknowledge Straw Hats' Innocence
keyMoments.description: The citizens of Fish-Man Island publicly acknowledge that the Straw Hat Pirates were not responsible for the kidnappings and helped save the island.
keyMoments.significance: Clears the crew's reputation on Fish-Man Island and establishes them as heroes rather than criminals.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
